name: squashily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is soft and easy to crush: The books were piled on an ancient, squashily comfortable sofa. In business class, there's a much more squashily cushioned seat.
More examplesFewer examplesThe seat is squashily padded and rather comfortable.The hotel has slightly dated but squashily comfortable rooms, with huge beds and plenty of space.I enjoyed the vegetable dumplings which were greasy, but squashily succulent.The carpet and curtains were cream and the navy sofas squashily comfortable.
